Waterbury.Town Plot Hill:
Town Plot is a neighborhood in the west end of the city of Waterbury, Connecticut.


== History ==
Situated at the top of the hill, it has historical significance as the original settlement of Waterbury in 1674 before the permanent town was laid out on the east side of the river. This is commemorated with the Harrub Pilgrim Memorial statue at the corner of Highland and Sunnyside Avenues.
